deposit(uint256,address).details: Tokens transfer must happen before calling deposit()The amount deposited is not passed as argument, but inferred by balance after transferring tokens and {vaultBalanceBefore}

params.vaultBalanceBefore: the Vault balance before registering deposit

params.approveSender: if true, approve the sender (can be only StakerGateway) to transfer the tokens

balance().notice: Returns the Vault's balance of the managed asset

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of the managed asset for a given owner

getAsset().notice: Returns the address of the asset managed by this vault

getConfig().notice: Returns the address of the Config instance

getDecimals().notice: Returns the number of decimals of the asset managed by this vault
